fileSamples.statement: (G : execution) (C C' : actid -> Prop) (smode : sim_mode) (thread : thread_id) (state : Language.state (thread_lts thread)) (CINCL : C ⊆₁ C') (COVSTEP : forall a : actid, tid a = thread -> C' a -> C a) (SIMSTATE : sim_state G smode C state) (PCOV : forall index : nat, C (ThreadEvent thread index) <-> index < eindex state) (state' : Language.state (thread_lts thread)) (SIMSTATE1 : sim_state_helper G smode state state') : sim_state G smode C' state.
fileSamples.proofString:
red.
splits; eauto.
ins.
split; ins.
apply PCOV.
apply COVSTEP; eauto.
apply CINCL.
by apply PCOV.

fileSamples.proofString:
ins.
split; ins.
apply PCOV.
apply COVSTEP; eauto.
apply CINCL.
by apply PCOV.
